meanings.definition: A period of 365 days or 12 months.
meanings.sent1: Last year, we celebrated my birthday with a big party.
meanings.sent2: A year has four seasons: spring, summer, fall, and winter.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe a whole year passed by without me noticing!
meanings.sent4: Her growth over the past year was like a flower blooming in spring.
meanings.sent5: The year seemed to fly by like a bird soaring through the sky.

meanings.definition: The time taken by a planet to make one revolution around the sun.
meanings.sent1: It takes Earth one year to orbit around the sun.
meanings.sent2: A year on Mars is longer than a year on Earth.
meanings.sent3: Imagine if a year on Earth was only a few days long!
meanings.sent4: The planet's year felt like a slow dance under the stars.
meanings.sent5: The year's journey around the sun was like a grand celestial waltz.

meanings.definition: A specific point in time measured in years.
meanings.sent1: The year 2020 was challenging for many people.
meanings.sent2: She was born in the same year as her best friend.
meanings.sent3: In what year did dinosaurs roam the Earth?
meanings.sent4: The year of her graduation marked a new beginning in her life.
meanings.sent5: The year of the great flood will always be remembered in our village.
